item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Sniffnet – monitor your Internet traffic (22 points | 2 comments)
2. Reverse-engineering and analysis of SanDisk High Endurance microSDXC card (2020) (171 points | 60 comments)
3. Show HN: Lume – OS lightweight CLI for MacOS & Linux VMs on Apple Silicon. (137 points | 36 comments)
4. Life Is More Than an Engineering Problem – Interview with Ted Chiang (201 points | 81 comments)
5. Analyzing the codebase of Caffeine: a high performance caching library (124 points | 13 comments)
6. Show HN: ESP32 RC Cars (197 points | 28 comments)
7. Fixing Left and Mutual Recursions in Grammars (72 points | 16 comments)
8. Macrodata Refinement (474 points | 253 comments)
9. RLHF Book (330 points | 25 comments)
10. Show HN: Modest – musical harmony library for Lua (39 points | 5 comments)
11. Recent results show that LLMs struggle with compositional tasks (254 points | 196 comments)
12. Researchers combine holograms and AI to create uncrackable optical encryption (12 points | 9 comments)
13. Inheritance and Subtyping (6 points | 1 comment)
14. Bzip3: A spiritual successor to BZip2 (293 points | 154 comments)
15. AstroForge selects target for "high risk, seat of the pants" asteroid mission (53 points | 16 comments)
16. A Rust procedural language handler for PostgreSQL (79 points | 17 comments)
17. Pointers Are Complicated II, or: We need better language specs (2020) (139 points | 73 comments)
18. A bookmarklet to kill sticky headers (2013) (181 points | 78 comments)
19. Visualizing all books of the world in ISBN-Space (430 points | 82 comments)
20. Python 3, Pygame, and Debian Bookworm on the Miyoo A30 (142 points | 26 comments)
21. The Doctor Who Drank Infectious Broth and Solved a Medical Mystery (2010) (32 points | 31 comments)
22. String of recent killings linked to Bay Area 'Zizians' (546 points | 701 comments)
23. Enhancing your MIDI devices with Perl (103 points | 23 comments)
24. LMD: A new, less wasteful metal 3D printing technique (98 points | 24 comments)
25. Sound & Efficient Generation of DOP Exploits via Programming Language Synthesis [pdf] (17 points | discuss)
26. The origin and unexpected evolution of the word "mainframe" (116 points | 34 comments)
27. Archivists work to save disappearing data.gov datasets (645 points | 191 comments)
28. A mouseless tale: trying for a keyboard-driven desktop (118 points | 67 comments)
29. Show HN: Hollow – A Customizable Digital Workspace (9 points | 10 comments)
30. Engineered waterways helped Ancient Amazonians became master maize farmers (40 points | 3 comments)
